name: Siebel: Defining Ancestry of Custom Applets
description: Reports the Applets that do not have this property or have it switch to off
output: This rule reports Applets not defining the Ancestry
rationale: The Upgrade Ancestor property allows copied objects (of types Applet, Business Component, Report, and Integration Object) to inherit properties of the original objects from which they were copied. During an upgrade, changes applied to the original objects are also applied to copied objects.
